Articles.Content:
My second stage always locks once I fire the first.  I checked the debug menu and RTstaginglock, RTsas, and RT something else are on the lock list and wont clear.  Any idea whats going on?

Edited September 7, 2018 by Seria17hri11er

Are you using a probe or a command pod?

If its a probe, you could well be running out of electricity OR, if you have comms network turned on, you could be going out of signal range/area.
Ah.  A telemetry unit.  Thank you. I will investigate further.
